name: Pop-Free CB 7 Quiz | Common Bond 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: A popular brand of Mexican beer is _____ Equis.
questions.explanation:
Dos.

	It means "Two Xs," and there are indeed two Xs on the label.

questions.text: This scientific device produces an intense, monochromatic beam of very focused light.
questions.explanation:
Laser.

	Lasers can use several materials in their construction, including rubies and germanium.

questions.text: A type of Hawaiian rough-surfaced lava formed from lava flows that cool quickly is known as...
questions.explanation:
aa.

	As the lava cools, the surface cracks, and more lava flows through and cools. This produces the rough surface.

questions.text: Another name for the South American three-toed sloth is...
questions.explanation:
Ai.

	There are two types of sloth; two-toed and three-toed. Both feed entirely on vegetation.

questions.text: How do you say "yes" in Russian?
Which term describes a particular period of time, usually defined by an event or person from that time?
questions.explanation:
Era.

	Some examples are the colonial era of early America and the civil rights era in the 1960s.

Wan.

	Cerulean is blue, rosaceous is pink or light red, and flavid is yellow.

questions.text: Most male goats are called bucks (by goat people) or billies (by the general public.) But Boer goat raisers in South Africa call a male goat something different; they call it a ...
questions.explanation:
Ram.

	Rams are normally male sheep.

questions.text: What do equestrians call signals sent to the horse through weight changes, leg movements and rein movements?
questions.explanation:
Aids.

	Certain aids are used for certain situations, such as pulling back on the reins and shifting backwards to stop the horse.

questions.text: So what do all of these answers have in common?
questions.explanation:
acronym & acronyms.

	An acronym is formed by taking the first letters (or first few letters) of each word in a phrase. 1- DOS= Disk Operating System2- LASER= Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation3- AA= Alcoholics Anonymous4- AI= Artificial Intelligence, Artificial Insemination5- DA= District Attorney6- ERA= Equal Rights Amendment, Earned Run Average7- WAN= Wide Area Network8- RAM= Random Access Memory9- AIDS= Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome
